data.chText: 固执的；执拗的；顽固的；倔强的
data.enText: determined not to change your opinion or attitude
He was too stubborn to admit that he was wrong.
She can be as stubborn as a mule .
difficult to get rid of or deal with

ex.chText: 她的许多雇员发现她个性固执。
ex.enText: Many of her employees find her inflexible.

ex.chText: 那家公司在这个问题上丝毫不肯变通。
ex.enText: The company is completely inflexible on this matter.

synonyms.bx: 多指人、机构等行事死板的，不愿意改变观念、决定、方法等。

ex.chText: 格伦年轻、任性，但骨子里是个好人。
ex.enText: Glenn is young and very headstrong, but he is a good man underneath it all.

ex.chText: 他是个任性的孩子，总是惹麻烦。
ex.enText: He was a headstrong kid, always getting into trouble.

synonyms.bx: 指人执拗任性的，强调行事偏执，不肯听从劝告。

ex.chText: 这姑娘有的时候会非常固执。
ex.enText: This girl can be obstinate at times.

ex.chText: 我的朋友非常顽固，而且又铁了心，是不会放弃的。
ex.enText: My friend is obstinate and determined, and will not give up.

synonyms.bx: 指人固执己见的，喜欢我行我素，不愿改变主意、行事方法等，常含贬义。

ex.enText: Why is the captain so stubborn/obstinate?
He was too stubborn/obstinate to admit that there was a problem.

synonyms.bx: 词义同obstinate，可换用，也常含贬义。

synonym.guide: 导航词义：顽固的，固执的

tr: tenaciously unwilling or marked by tenacious unwillingness to yield

value.def: Someone who is stubborn or who behaves in a stubborn way is determined to do what they want and is very unwilling to change their mind.

example.ex: He is a stubborn character used to getting his own way...
example.tran: 他性格固执，惯于一意孤行。

example.ex: His face was set in an expression of stubborn determination.
example.tran: 他脸上流露出固执坚定的表情。

value.tran: 倔强的;固执的;顽固的;执拗的

example.ex: He stubbornly refused to tell her how he had come to be in such a state.
example.tran: 他固执地拒绝告诉她自己是如何沦落到这种地步的。

example.ex: I couldn't tell if his refusal to talk was simple stubbornness.
example.tran: 我不清楚他拒绝说话是否只是因为他的顽固不化。

value.def: A stubborn stain or problem is difficult to remove or to deal with.

example.ex: This treatment removes the most stubborn stains...
example.tran: 这个方法能清除大多数顽固污渍。

example.ex: The first and most stubborn problem was that of reductions in the number of aircraft.
example.tran: 最首要也是最棘手的问题是飞机数量的减少。

value.tran: (污渍)顽固的，难以去除的;(问题)棘手的，难以解决的

example.ex: Some interest rates have remained stubbornly high.
example.tran: 部分利率一直居高不下。
